channel.title: Market Leader on FinanClub

item.title: ZI
item.description: score:58 Chances: ZoomInfo has been named the top Enterprise solution in 10 categories in G2’s Spring 2024 Grid Reports for customer satisfaction and market presence, showcasing its strong market position and customer satisfaction. The company received Google Cloud’s 2024 Partner of the Year Award for Technology: Data - Provider and Technology: Marketplace - Business Applications, indicating strong recognition from a prominent industry player.
